That is rubbish. That is not the only reason. They also accepted bribes. 29% to about$ 6.37 billion. Analysts surveyed by Thomson Reuters expected a profit of$ 8.09 a share on revenue of$ 6.06 billion. Eric Schmidt said the latest results were driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. Gross margin widened to 65.1% from 63.9%. In the most recent period, Google expanded its head count 4.6% to 24,400 full-time workers. Search ads remain the company's

`` In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Larry Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.''
